data.title: Pedder Street Asia Absolute Return Fund — Overview
data.meta_description: Value-oriented Asia ex-Japan equity long/short (long-biased) strategy that mainly invests across Greater China, Southeast Asia, India, and Korea. The strategy invests in publicly listed equities of companies with superior fundamental attributes and with valuations that offer sufficient safeguard against any unexpected adverse change to their fundamentals. The strategy may invest in companies which are less well known to investors, less covered by analysts, or companies misunderstood by the markets and hence not popular amongst investors.The strategy may engage in short selling of equities of specific companies with inferior fundamental attributes and with an overvalued stock price.
data.text:
Introduction

Value-oriented Asia ex-Japan equity long/short (long-biased) strategy that mainly invests across Greater China, Southeast Asia, India, and Korea. The strategy invests in publicly listed equities of companies with superior fundamental attributes and with valuations that offer sufficient safeguard against any unexpected adverse change to their fundamentals. The strategy may invest in companies which are less well known to investors, less covered by analysts, or companies misunderstood by the markets and hence not popular amongst investors.The strategy may engage in short selling of equities of specific companies with inferior fundamental attributes and with an overvalued stock price.

The Edgefolio Platform

Sign up today for free to access accurate and timely data on Pedder Street Asia Absolute Return Fund and 150,000 other funds.

If you’re the manager of Pedder Street Asia Absolute Return Fund, you can sign up to take control of your profile and respond to investor interest.
